@graph.name: How to Manually Change Product Order in Shopify
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to manually arrange products using drag-and-drop functionality in Shopify collections

step.name: Access Shopify Admin
step.text: Log into your Shopify admin dashboard

step.name: Navigate to Collections
step.text: On the left sidebar, click 'Products', then click 'Collections'

step.name: Select Collection
step.text: Find the collection you want to modify and click its name

step.name: Access Products Section
step.text: Scroll down to the 'Products' section within the collection

step.name: Enable Manual Sorting
step.text: Click the sort dropdown menu and select 'Manually'

step.name: Drag and Drop Products
step.text: Click and drag the six-dot icon next to any product to reorder them. Changes save automatically

@graph.name: How to Set Up Automated Product Sorting in Shopify
@graph.description: Guide to implementing automated sorting rules for Shopify product collections

step.name: Navigate to Collection
step.text: Go to Products -> Collections and select your target collection

step.name: Access Sort Options
step.text: Find the Products section and locate the sort dropdown menu

step.name: Select Sorting Method
step.text: Choose from options like 'Best selling', 'Price: Low to High', 'Price: High to Low', 'Newest to Oldest', or 'Alphabetical A-Z'

step.name: Save Changes
step.text: Scroll up and click the 'Save' button to apply the automated sorting (this step is required for automated sorts)

mainEntity.name: What's the best way to change my Shopify product order to make more money?

acceptedAnswer.text: The easiest and often most effective way is to set the collection order to 'Best selling.' It uses social proof to sell for you, showing all customers what's popular. This improves the experience and usually leads to more sales without you having to do anything else.

mainEntity.name: Can I move all my discounted stuff to the front?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Just change the product order in that collection to 'Manually.' It's the perfect way to highlight items with a special price or discount at the very top. It definitely has a positive impact on sales.

mainEntity.name: Does the order really matter if I have tons of products?

acceptedAnswer.text: Absolutely. Maybe even more so. With a huge number of products, nobody is going to scroll through everything. Manually sorting is a nightmare, so using automated sorting by price or best-selling is the best way to make your store easy to navigate and help customers find what they want without getting overwhelmed.
